channel.title: 2. Environment Setup on Create a new AWS account.
channel.description: Recent content in 2. Environment Setup on Create a new AWS account.

item.title: Install AWS CLI and Docker Desktop
item.description: 2.1 Install AWS CLI 2.1.1 Minimum Requirements Operating System: Windows, macOS, or Linux. An AWS account has been created. 2.1.2 Steps Download AWS CLI Windows: Download the installer from AWS CLI v2 Download. macOS: Install via brew or download the .pkg file. Linux: Use the .zip package or your package manager (apt, yum). Install Windows: Open the .msi file and follow the installation steps.
